failure.message:
Unable to verify object 'Object Repository/Common/Sign In/div_Login_Popup' is present (Root cause: com.kms.katalon.core.webui.exception.WebElementNotFoundException: Web element with id: 'Object Repository/Common/Sign In/div_Login_Popup' located by 'By.xpath: //div[@id = 'tutorial-borrower' and (text() = concat('
Application portal tutorial overlay
✕
Now, for some homework!
This space provides a secure way to:
Complete critical tasks, like signing and providing documents Get updates about your loan’s progress
Communicate with your mortgage team and other folks you invite to participate
Together with your team, you’ll be moving your loan closer to the finish line. Don’t worry, you’ll be notified by email of activity while you’re away.
Next
✕
Add Your Documents Online
The Tasks tab tells you what information or action we still need from you. This is where you' , "'" , 'll provide the documents we need to process your loan, and sign important documents from us.
Click on a task to get started, and follow the directions to upload your documents.
Next
✕
Stay Up-to-Date
As your loan progresses through the key stages, you' , "'" , 'll see the latest activity posted in your Stream.
You can comment on activities, post a question or add another person like your Realtor to the transaction. To add people, just click Invite a Collaborator.
Next
✕
We' , "'" , 're Here to Help
Your mortgage team can help answer questions you have along the way. Use the Stream and the Chat to get in touch with us at any time. We' , "'" , 're looking forward to working with you!
Done
') or . = concat('
